key_risks: Competitive pressure from industry giants like Cisco, Nokia, and Huawei
Dependence on the telecom sector, making it vulnerable to economic downturns
Integration challenges from the acquisition of ECI Telecom
Regulatory risks due to changes in global telecommunications policies
Supply chain disruptions affecting product delivery and operations
governance_issues: Financial restructuring efforts may not fully offset competitive and market pressures
